Boaz Avital - Core Storage and Manhattan at Twitter

ABSTRACT: 
Manhattan is Twitter’s primary distributed key-value store. This talk will cover the general architecture of the storage system, along with the motivations, tradeoffs and  [...]
Download slides and read the full abstract here:
